sentence.Network_en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentence.Network_en: Please find two samples enclosed herewith.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(GH)--石油百科 ... hereupon 于是 herewith 同此 heritage 遗产.
Sending Proforma Invoice... ... 24. out of question 毫无问题 1. herewith 同此, 并此(信中用语) 2. enclosed 被附上的.
英语里哪些字母是由here开头的。_百度知道 ... hereupon: 此刻，随后 herewith: 与此一道，随函附上 hereabout 附近, 在这一带.

list.abs: A set of samples is enclosed herewith ., 附信附上一套样品.
A cheque is enclosed herewith ., 随信附上支票一张.
We enclosing herewith an inquiry sheet ., 我们随函寄上询价单一份.
We are enclosing herewith an inquiry sheet ., 我们随函附寄询价单一份.
herewith some notes for your reference ., 以下几点供你参考.
2007年5月29日 -  herewith copy 兹将副本抄录如下 HerHis Majesty's Customs &;amp; Excise 英国税务 HerHis Majesty's Government 英国政府 HerHis Majesty's ship.

entry.tran: 随本文（或本书）附上;随信附上
entry.def: Herewith means with this document, text, or book. You can use herewith in a letter to say that you are enclosing something with it.

example.ex: ...the 236 revolutionary prisoners whose names are listed herewith...
example.tran: 236名革命囚犯，名单附在本材料中

sentences.sentence: "I hereby declare you man and wife"

auth_sentence.content: Herewith, then, is a disinterested older gentleman's advice for Patton's bachelor son: Don't be in any hurry to get married.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Herewith, then, is a disinterested older gentleman's advice for Patton's bachelor son: Don't be in any hurry to get married.

auth_sentence.content: Herewith, a peek at the top five collections with the accessories of the moment.

auth_sentence.content: Herewith are five policy rules that can help us to establish antifragility as a principle of our socioeconomic life.

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a draft for the sum of 100 dollars.
